metadata.title: CVE-2024-55636 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Drupal Core allowsObject Injection.This issue affects Drupal Core: from 8.0.0 before 10.2.11,from 10.3.0 before 10.3.9, from 11.0.0 before 11.0.8.Drupal core contains a chain of methods that is exploitable when aninsecure deserialization vulnerability exists on the site. This so calledgadget chain presents no direct threat, but is a vector that can be used toachieve remote code execution if the application deserializes untrusteddata due to another vulnerability.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
